headline: The Wendy’s Company (WEN): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on The Wendy’s Company on Alpha Talon Investment Research’s Substack by AT Investment Research. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on WEN. The Wendy’s Company’s share was trading at $8.02 as of February 6th. WEN’s trailing and forward P/E were 8.51 and 9.05 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. The […]
